com.jidesoft.editor.margin
Class AbstractMarginPainter

java.lang.Object
  com.jidesoft.margin.AbstractMarginPainter
      com.jidesoft.editor.margin.AbstractMarginPainter
All Implemented Interfaces:
MarginPainter
public abstract class AbstractMarginPainter
extends AbstractMarginPainter

An abstract implementation of MarginPainter interface. It implements the AbstractMarginPainter.getLayer() method so that you can use AbstractMarginPainter.setLayer(int) to set the layer index. You still need to implement the other method paintMargin.
